sentences.en: The results of a growing number of studies suggest that even a modest vitamin shortfall can be harmful to your health.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的研究结果表明，即使是轻微的维生素缺乏也会对健康有害。

sentences.en: Texas has been fearing a shortfall for some time.
sentences.cn: 德州人对于预算缺口的担心有一段日子了。

sentences.en: The corporate makes up any shortfall in funds.
sentences.cn: 企业需要填补任何资金短缺。
